input_email_body:
Subject: Performance Issues

Hello customer support, I am experiencing a performance slowdown in my data analytics system, which I believe could be due to high data volume and server overload My name is Jane Smith.. I have already restarted affected applications and optimized queries, but the issue still persists You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.. I would greatly appreciate your assistance in resolving this matter. If you need any additional information from me, please let me know. I am looking forward to your response soon.
